title: Bitcoin‚Äôs (BTC) Real Floor Is Stronger Than You Think: Here‚Äôs Why
body: TL;DR Long-term Bitcoin holders from 2017‚Äì2019 keep BTC untouched, building a strong market foundation. Institutions hedge spot exposure with options, signaling capital inflows rather than retail panic. Technical breakout and bullish RSI divergence show resistance weakening and support strengthening for BTC. Long-Term Holders Remain Steady Bitcoin holders with coins aged between 5 and 7 years are now entering a new category. Data shows that the Realized Cap of this group has dropped from around $14.9 billion to $8.5 billion in the past year. According to analyst Cas Abb√©, this decline is not due to selling. Instead, most of these coins have simply moved into the 7+ year age band. That means they have stayed in the same wallets, untouched, since being purchased between 2017 and 2019. ‚ÄúThese aren‚Äôt weak hands,‚Äù Abb√© said. ‚ÄúThey‚Äôve survived halvings, crashes, FUD waves, and blow-off tops.‚Äù Notably, this shift shows that long-term investors continue to hold their positions through changing market conditions. Unlike many assets, Bitcoin is not cycling through new owners as often. The same wallets continue to accumulate and hold. $BTC holders are quietly proving why they‚Äôre the backbone of every cycle. Over the past year, the 5‚Äì7 year cohort‚Äôs Realized Cap dropped from ~$14.9B ‚Üí ~$8.5B. But here‚Äôs the catch, this isn‚Äôt because they sold. Almost all of it simply aged into the 7y+ bands. That means‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/Q4mBJuz0Jn ‚Äî Cas Abb√© (@cas_abbe) September 9, 2025 Options Market Shows Institutional Movement Activity in the Bitcoin options market is also drawing attention. Analyst BitBull noted that the 1-month 25 Delta Skew has reached a new high. This metric often reflects a rise in demand for downside protection. ‚ÄúEveryone‚Äôs staring at price, but the real action is in the options market,‚Äù BitBull posted. ‚ÄúThis isn‚Äôt retail panic, it‚Äôs institutions hedging.‚Äù As ETFs and other investment products become more common , large players are entering the space. Many of these firms hedge their spot positions with puts. The increase in skew shows this hedging in progress. Source: BitBull/X While this might appear to signal fear, it reflects risk management. Institutions are building exposure while protecting it against short-term drops. Price Action Signals Support is Building Bitcoin recently broke out of a multi-week downtrend, which has been confirmed with multiple daily closes above it. After the breakout, the price tested resistance around $113,500, a level that previously acted as support in August. The rejection from that level was shallow. The asset fell briefly, then quickly returned to retest the same area. Analyst Rekt Capital observed , ‚ÄúThis resistance may be weakening as a point of rejection.‚Äù Source: Rekt Capital/X Bitcoin is now trading near $113,000. If it closes above $113,500, further upside may follow. If not, a move back to $110,000 seems likely. Another observation came from Merlijn The Trader, who pointed to a divergence between price and RSI on the weekly chart. While the price made lower lows, RSI posted higher lows. ‚ÄúPrice makes lower lows. RSI makes higher lows,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúThis is a textbook bear trap.‚Äù This pattern is being watched closely by traders looking for signs of trend change. The post Bitcoin‚Äôs (BTC) Real Floor Is Stronger Than You Think: Here‚Äôs Why appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: Revolutionary Ripple Crypto Custody: Powering BBVA‚Äôs Digital Asset Future
body: BitcoinWorld Revolutionary Ripple Crypto Custody: Powering BBVA‚Äôs Digital Asset Future The cryptocurrency world is buzzing with significant news! Ripple, a leading enterprise blockchain and crypto solutions provider, has officially announced a pivotal partnership. They will be providing their robust Ripple crypto custody services to BBVA, a major Spanish banking group. This collaboration marks a crucial step forward for institutional engagement with digital assets, ensuring secure and compliant storage solutions. Why is BBVA Embracing Ripple Crypto Custody? This isn‚Äôt BBVA‚Äôs first foray into the digital asset space. The bank previously launched Bitcoin and Ethereum custody services for its retail investors in July. This latest move with Ripple demonstrates a clear strategic expansion into institutional-grade solutions. By leveraging Ripple‚Äôs specialized technology, BBVA aims to securely manage and store tokenized assets, including a broader range of cryptocurrencies, for its institutional clients. The decision by a bank of BBVA‚Äôs stature to deepen its commitment to digital assets signals a growing trend. Financial institutions are increasingly recognizing the immense potential of blockchain technology and cryptocurrencies. However, security and regulatory compliance remain paramount concerns for these established players. Understanding Ripple‚Äôs Secure Crypto Custody Solution What exactly does Ripple crypto custody entail? It refers to the specialized technology and services Ripple offers to financial institutions for the secure storage and management of digital assets. These solutions are meticulously designed to meet the stringent security and compliance requirements of traditional banking environments. Key aspects of Ripple‚Äôs custody technology often include: Advanced Security Protocols: Utilizing multi-signature authentication and robust encryption to protect assets from unauthorized access. Regulatory Compliance: Built to adhere to global financial regulations, making it easier for banks to integrate crypto services legally and responsibly. Scalability: Designed to handle a growing volume of digital assets and transactions as institutional adoption increases. Operational Efficiency: Streamlining the process of managing digital assets, from secure storage to seamless transfer and reporting. This comprehensive technology provides the necessary infrastructure for banks like BBVA to confidently offer crypto-related services to their high-net-worth and corporate clients. The Broader Impact of Institutional Crypto Adoption The partnership between Ripple and BBVA goes beyond just one bank or one service. It highlights a significant shift in the financial landscape. When major banks offer Ripple crypto custody or similar services, it lends considerable credibility and legitimacy to the digital asset market. This institutional embrace has several key implications: Increased Trust: Traditional investors and corporations may feel more comfortable entering the crypto space when trusted financial institutions provide secure and regulated services. Market Maturation: The involvement of regulated entities helps mature the market, potentially reducing volatility and increasing stability by attracting more stable capital. Regulatory Clarity: As more institutions engage, there‚Äôs a greater push for clearer and more comprehensive regulatory frameworks, which benefits the entire industry. New Financial Products: It paves the way for innovative financial products and services built on digital assets, from tokenized securities to new investment vehicles. These developments are crucial for moving cryptocurrencies from a niche interest to a mainstream, globally integrated financial instrument. What Does This Mean for the Future of Finance? This collaboration is a powerful indicator of the evolving relationship between traditional finance and the crypto world. It suggests a future where digital assets are seamlessly integrated into existing banking structures, rather than operating in parallel. The secure storage solutions provided by Ripple are foundational to this transformation. The provision of secure Ripple crypto custody by a bank like BBVA could: Accelerate the tokenization of real-world assets, making them more liquid and accessible to a broader investor base. Foster greater interoperability between different blockchain networks and traditional financial systems, creating a more unified financial ecosystem. Position Ripple as a key infrastructure provider for the institutional crypto market, strengthening its role in global finance. Ultimately, such partnerships are laying the groundwork for a more efficient, transparent, and digitally-driven global financial system. This forward-thinking approach is setting new standards for how digital assets are managed and utilized by established financial institutions. The announcement that Ripple will provide Ripple crypto custody services to BBVA is a landmark event. It underscores the growing demand for institutional-grade digital asset solutions and highlights Ripple‚Äôs strategic position in meeting these needs. As more traditional banks follow BBVA‚Äôs lead, we can expect a continued acceleration of cryptocurrency adoption and integration into the global financial ecosystem. This partnership is not just about technology; it‚Äôs about building trust and paving the way for the next era of finance. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: What are crypto custody services? A1: Crypto custody services involve the secure storage and management of digital assets (cryptocurrencies) on behalf of individuals or institutions, often utilizing advanced security measures like cold storage, multi-signature wallets, and robust cybersecurity protocols. Q2: Why is BBVA partnering with Ripple for custody? A2: BBVA is partnering with Ripple to leverage their specialized technology for institutional-grade secure storage of tokenized assets, expanding beyond their existing retail offerings and ensuring compliance with stringent financial regulations. Q3: How does Ripple crypto custody benefit institutional clients? A3: Institutional clients benefit from enhanced security, regulatory compliance, scalability, and operational efficiency, allowing them to confidently engage with digital assets while meeting their strict internal and external requirements for asset management. Q4: Will this partnership make cryptocurrencies more mainstream? A4: Yes, the involvement of major banks like BBVA in providing secure crypto services significantly increases trust and credibility. This is crucial for the mainstream adoption and maturation of the cryptocurrency market, attracting a wider range of participants. Q5: What other services does Ripple offer besides custody? A5: Beyond custody, Ripple offers a suite of enterprise blockchain and crypto solutions, including cross-border payments (RippleNet), liquidity solutions (On-Demand Liquidity or ODL), and central bank digital currency (CBDC) platforms. Found this insight into Ripple and BBVA‚Äôs partnership valuable? Share this article with your network on social media to spread the word about the exciting developments in institutional crypto adoption! To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping institutional adoption. title: BOJ must raise rates to protect Yen, says Japanese lawmaker
body: Taro Kono, a senior member of the ruling Liberal Democratic Party, said the Bank of Japan must raise its main interest rate to protect the yen and prevent inflation from worsening. His remarks show how policymakers debate the central bank‚Äôs policy as Japan faces uncertainty in leadership and economic plans. Kono spoke in an interview and said that weak monetary policy causes Japan‚Äôs inflation problems. He warned that if the BOJ keeps delaying a rate hike, import prices will remain high and households will continue to face rising costs. The yen traded at about 147.35 to the dollar on Tuesday morning, which is weak compared to its five-year average of 133.61. Kono rejects cash handouts and urges BOJ to act on weak yen Kono was opposed to the idea of providing cash handouts to citizens as a means of gaining favor and political support. He stated that such methods may appear helpful, but disrupt Japan‚Äôs fiscal deficit. They also do not solve the country‚Äôs biggest problem, which he says the Bank of Japan is responsible for. Since the BOJ has insisted on keeping interest rates low, the yen has grown weaker year after year, making imported goods even more expensive. Japan depends on imports for energy, food, and many raw materials, and the weak yen has increased the prices of goods and reduced the spending power of households across the country. Kono stated that the only solution is for the BOJ to immediately raise interest rates to strengthen the yen, slow inflation, and give citizens some financial relief from the high cost of living. Kono also stated that government spending programs or cash handouts are not permanent solutions because they do not solve the biggest issue of low interest rates, which is responsible for Japan‚Äôs inflation problem. His comments demonstrate just how divided the Liberal Democratic Party is. Some of its leaders still support loose monetary policies and aggressive government spending, hoping it would stimulate growth. On the other hand, their counterparts say policymakers need a more disciplined approach that puts currency stability and long-term financial health above anything else. Kono pressures BOJ amid leadership turmoil Kono‚Äôs warning to the BOJ came just a few days after Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba announced his resignation from office. The prime minister‚Äôs decision shocked the nation and created doubt about Japan‚Äôs political and economic direction, as the country is struggling with rising inflation. Ishida‚Äôs exit stirred up conflict and competition within the Liberal Democratic Party because the next prime minister will also greatly influence how the government responds to economic challenges. The main candidates have different views about how to deal with the failing economy. Sanae Takaichi, a leading contender, stated that the BOJ should continue with its loose monetary policies, showing her support for using government spending to boost growth. The problem with her approach is that it will likely increase Japan‚Äôs already massive public debt, and many economists warn that this could worsen the current economic conditions. The Bank of Japan is preparing for its next policy meeting on September 19, even as the political debate grows louder by the day. Most financial analysts say the central bank will likely maintain its current policies despite the growing criticism. Such expectations prove just how cautious the BOJ is when it comes to economic policies, and it also shows how detached it is from the views of lawmakers like Kono. title: NexStox Launches Two Regulated RWA Platforms at WOW Summit Hong Kong: NexStox (LFSA) and NXMarket
body: Hong Kong, 8 September 2025 ‚Äì NexStox announced the official launch of two regulated centralised platforms for Real-World Assets (RWA) at WOW Summit, Hong Kong: NexStox, licensed by the Labuan Financial Services Authority (LFSA) and NXMarket in the Philippines. Both platforms are now live, providing compliant offerings and secondary trading for tokenised securities backed by real-world assets and businesses. ‚ÄúLaunching at WOW Summit is a statement of intent,‚Äù said Cathal Donnellan, President of NexStox. ‚ÄúInvestors have been eagerly awaiting RWA markets that combine the security and transparency of traditional exchanges, while offering the ease-of-use, borderless nature, and 24/7 availability of digital assets markets. With NexStox and NXMarket, we are providing both institutions and retail investors alike a clear, regulated path to access agriculture, real estate, private stocks, infrastructure and other asset classes without compromising on governance, disclosure, or market integrity.‚Äù ‚ÄúThe NexStox Group is offering a fast, efficient, and low-cost entry into the licensed and regulated RWA token marketplace. We are looking at a starting price tag of as little as just $10,000, so come talk to us today on how every company can RWA to RWB their assets and business.‚Äù NexStox‚Äôs dual-jurisdiction approach is designed to provide issuers with distribution flexibility and investors with clarity on the rules, protections, and lifecycle management of digital securities. The platforms support end-to-end issuer workflows, from onboarding and structuring through to listing, corporate actions, and ongoing disclosure. Market operations incorporate KYC/AML controls in line with local regulations and surveillance designed to safeguard fair and orderly trading. About NexStox NexStox operates regulated digital platforms for Real-World Assets (RWA). Through NexStox (LFSA-licensed) and NXMarket, the company provides compliant issuance and secondary trading of tokenised, yield-bearing securities backed by tangible businesses and assets. The platforms help institutional and retail participants access RWAs and real-world businesses (RWB) across sectors, including agriculture, real estate, credit and infrastructure, bringing efficiency, transparency and liquidity to previously illiquid markets. title: Nasdaq President Seeks SEC Approval To Tokenize All Assets On Exchange
body: With companies like BlackRock driving significant growth in the tokenization space, American stock exchange Nasdaq is poised to take advantage of this development by working with US authorities to make it easier for tokenized securities to be traded. Nasdaq‚Äôs Vision For Transforming Traditional Financial Services In a recent LinkedIn post, Nasdaq President Tal Cohen emphasized the potential of integrating tokenization and blockchain technology with traditional market infrastructure. He pointed out that this fusion could provide substantial advantages to issuers, investors, and the broader economy by reducing friction in transactions, speeding up settlement times, automating processes, and enhancing capital and collateral management efficiencies. As part of this effort, Nasdaq has submitted a filing to the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) to enable the trading of tokenized securities on its platform. In his remarks, Cohen acknowledged the potential of blockchain technology to introduce new post-trade processes, modernize proxy voting, and create programmable methods for managing corporate actions. The rise of decentralized finance (DeFi) has offered valuable insights into how core financial services‚Äîsuch as lending, trading, and clearing‚Äîcan operate differently to deliver value. However, Cohen also highlighted the risks associated with rapid advancements. Cohen stressed the importance of embedding governance and investor protection from the outset to ensure that the benefits of innovation can be fully realized. First Token-Settled Trades By Late 2026? Nasdaq‚Äôs recent filing is seen as a pivotal step in its journey to incorporate digital asset technology into the US equities markets responsibly. The proposal aims to integrate new capabilities into the existing financial system, further enhancing the efficiency and trustworthiness of these markets. If the SEC approves Nasdaq‚Äôs proposal, it would represent the first instance of tokenized securities being traded on a major US stock exchange, marking a significant milestone in the integration of blockchain-based settlement into the national market system. Notably, Coinbase, the largest US cryptocurrency exchange , has also sought the regulatory agency‚Äôs approval for offering ‚Äútokenized equities‚Äù to its users, while major banks like Bank of America and Citi have expressed interest in exploring tokenized assets. Once Nasdaq‚Äôs proposal is in place and the necessary infrastructure from the central clearing agency is operational, investors could potentially buy shares on Nasdaq that settle in token form, all without altering the current processes for order routing, pricing, surveillance, or reporting. Nasdaq anticipates that US investors may witness the first token-settled trades by the end of the third quarter of 2026, contingent upon the readiness of the Depository Trust Company‚Äôs infrastructure. title: Global Crypto Warning: Ledger Flags Major JavaScript Supply Chain Breach
body: Ledger‚Äôs Chief Technology Officer Charles Guillemet has sounded an alarm over what he described as one of the most serious supply chain attacks ever to hit the JavaScript ecosystem. Ledger Issues Urgent Warning On Monday, Ledger CTO Guillemet posted on X that the npm account of a reputable open-source maintainer had been compromised, leading to malicious updates across widely used software libraries. He wrote, ‚ÄúThere‚Äôs a large-scale supply chain attack in progress‚Ä¶ the entire JavaScript ecosystem may be at risk.‚Äù He stressed that hardware wallet users remain secure if they verify every transaction, but advised all others to stop conducting blockchain transactions temporarily. Malicious Updates to Widely Used Packages The breach occurred on September 8 when hackers gained access to the npm account of Josh Goldberg, known as ‚ÄúQix.‚Äù Attackers published corrupted versions of 18 packages, including chalk, debug, strip-ansi, and color-convert, which collectively account for more than 2.6 billion weekly downloads and are embedded in core developer tools like Babel and ESLint. Researchers discovered that the injected code carried ‚Äúcrypto-clipper‚Äù malware designed to intercept browser functions. The payload swaps legitimate wallet addresses with attacker-controlled ones and, in some cases, hijacks wallet communications to modify transactions before signatures are applied. The malware was first detected after a build error revealed hidden obfuscated code. Sophisticated Attack Strategy Analysis showed the malware was engineered with dual tactics: passively replacing wallet addresses with lookalikes, while actively intercepting and altering transactions on browser-based wallets such as MetaMask. This layered approach allowed attackers to redirect funds seamlessly, often without users realizing. Investigations suggest the breach originated from a phishing attack on npm maintainers. Fraudulent emails, posing as official npm security notices, instructed recipients to update two-factor authentication or risk account suspension. Victims who followed the link were directed to a fake login page, allowing attackers to seize credentials and infiltrate Goldberg‚Äôs account. Once inside, the attackers distributed malicious versions of the core packages, effectively weaponizing software tools relied upon by millions. Security firm Aikido noted that the code functioned as a browser interceptor, capable of rewriting payment destinations, altering API calls, and tampering with website content. Ongoing Fallout and Industry Concerns Although npm has removed many of the compromised versions, security experts warn that hidden transitive dependencies make it difficult to fully contain the attack. Developers are being urged to audit projects, pin known-safe package versions, and rebuild lockfiles immediately. The incident underscores the fragility of the open-source ecosystem, which depends heavily on trust between maintainers and developers. With wallet addresses linked to stolen funds already surfacing on-chain, researchers are calling the attack one of the most severe in the history of the JavaScript ecosystem. title: Bitcoin DEX: Bitfinex‚Äôs Pivotal Investment in KaleidoSwap Unlocks New Horizons
body: BitcoinWorld Bitcoin DEX: Bitfinex‚Äôs Pivotal Investment in KaleidoSwap Unlocks New Horizons The world of decentralized finance (DeFi) is constantly evolving, and a truly significant development has just put the spotlight firmly on Bitcoin. Major cryptocurrency exchange Bitfinex has made a pivotal investment in KaleidoSwap, a groundbreaking Bitcoin DEX . This strategic move is set to accelerate the development of a truly Bitcoin-native decentralized exchange, promising new and exciting opportunities for the global crypto community. This collaboration underscores a growing commitment to enhancing Bitcoin‚Äôs utility beyond just a store of value. What is a Bitcoin DEX and Why is it Important for Crypto Users? A Bitcoin DEX , or Decentralized Exchange, is a trading platform built directly on the Bitcoin blockchain or leveraging its second layers, such as the Lightning Network. Unlike traditional centralized exchanges, a DEX allows users to trade cryptocurrencies without needing to give up custody of their funds to a third party. This fundamental difference significantly enhances security, privacy, and user control, aligning perfectly with the core ethos of decentralization. KaleidoSwap stands out because it is specifically designed to operate natively on Bitcoin and utilize the Lightning Network. This innovative approach aims to overcome the traditional scalability challenges often associated with Bitcoin‚Äôs base layer. By doing so, it enables significantly faster and cheaper transactions, making decentralized trading on Bitcoin a more practical and appealing reality for a wider audience. The Strategic Impact: How Bitfinex‚Äôs Investment Fuels Innovation Bitfinex‚Äôs investment is a strong vote of confidence in KaleidoSwap‚Äôs vision and its cutting-edge technology. The infusion of funds will be instrumental in further building out this pioneering Bitcoin DEX . This means more resources dedicated to critical areas such as core development, robust security enhancements, and expanding the platform‚Äôs feature set to meet growing user demands. Specifically, this investment offers several key benefits: Accelerated Development: The capital injection will empower KaleidoSwap to expand its team of developers and engineers, thereby accelerating the implementation of its ambitious roadmap and bringing new functionalities to market faster. Enhanced User Experience: With increased resources, KaleidoSwap can focus on refining its user interfaces, improving backend infrastructure, and ensuring a smoother, more intuitive trading experience for all participants. Greater Liquidity and Market Depth: A well-funded and actively developed DEX is more likely to attract a larger user base and, consequently, more trading volume and liquidity. This is crucial for efficient price discovery and minimal slippage during trades. Robust Security: Further investment in auditing and security protocols will strengthen the platform against potential vulnerabilities, reinforcing trust in the Bitcoin DEX ecosystem. This strategic backing from a prominent and established player like Bitfinex underscores the growing interest and necessity for robust Bitcoin-native DeFi solutions, signaling a potential shift beyond predominantly Ethereum-centric applications. Unlocking the Potential of the Lightning Network for Decentralized Trading The Lightning Network is a ‚Äúlayer 2‚Äù scaling solution built on top of the Bitcoin blockchain. It is specifically designed to facilitate instant, high-volume, and extremely low-cost transactions. By integrating the Lightning Network, KaleidoSwap aims to provide a decentralized trading experience that is not only secure and censorship-resistant but also incredibly efficient. Imagine the possibility of trading Bitcoin and other digital assets with near-instant settlement times and negligible fees ‚Äì that‚Äôs the transformative promise of a Lightning-powered Bitcoin DEX . This integration is absolutely key to making decentralized trading on Bitcoin a practical and scalable reality for everyday users and institutions alike. It directly addresses the common criticisms regarding Bitcoin‚Äôs transaction speed and cost, positioning it as a highly viable foundation for complex and high-frequency DeFi applications. What Does This Mean for the Future of Decentralized Finance on Bitcoin? Bitfinex‚Äôs investment in KaleidoSwap signifies a broader and crucial trend towards diversifying the DeFi landscape. While Ethereum has long been the dominant blockchain for decentralized applications, the emergence of robust Bitcoin DEX platforms like KaleidoSwap highlights Bitcoin‚Äôs significant, yet largely untapped, potential in the DeFi space. This development could very well inspire a wave of further innovation in Bitcoin-native applications, leading to a more secure, resilient, and truly decentralized financial ecosystem. Users can look forward to a wider array of options for trading, lending, and borrowing, all while maintaining greater control over their assets on the world‚Äôs most secure blockchain. Moreover, it sets a powerful precedent for how established centralized entities can proactively contribute to the growth and maturation of decentralized protocols, effectively bridging the gap between traditional crypto services and the cutting edge of DeFi innovation. This strategic move is not just about one investment; it‚Äôs about validating a vision for Bitcoin‚Äôs future as a versatile platform for financial innovation, beyond its role as digital gold. Conclusion: A Pivotal Step Towards a Bitcoin-Powered DeFi Future The strategic investment by Bitfinex in KaleidoSwap marks a truly significant milestone for the entire cryptocurrency industry. By empowering the development of a robust Bitcoin DEX on the Lightning Network, this partnership is paving the way for a more scalable, efficient, and profoundly decentralized future for Bitcoin. It‚Äôs an exciting time to watch how this innovation unfolds and ultimately reshapes the decentralized finance landscape, offering users more secure and efficient ways to interact with their digital assets. Frequently Asked Questions About Bitcoin DEX and KaleidoSwap What is a Bitcoin DEX? A Bitcoin DEX is a decentralized exchange built on the Bitcoin blockchain or its scaling layers like the Lightning Network. It allows users to trade cryptocurrencies peer-to-peer without giving up custody of their funds to a central authority, offering enhanced security and control. Why is Bitfinex investing in KaleidoSwap significant? Bitfinex‚Äôs investment is a major endorsement of KaleidoSwap‚Äôs vision for a Bitcoin-native DEX. It provides crucial funding and strategic backing, accelerating development and signaling growing institutional interest in Bitcoin-centric decentralized finance solutions. How does the Lightning Network improve KaleidoSwap? The Lightning Network is a layer-2 solution that enables instant, low-cost transactions on Bitcoin. By leveraging it, KaleidoSwap can offer a highly efficient trading experience with faster settlements and significantly reduced fees, addressing Bitcoin‚Äôs base layer scalability concerns. What are the main benefits of using a Bitcoin DEX? The primary benefits include enhanced security (you retain custody of your assets), greater privacy, censorship resistance, and typically lower fees and faster transaction speeds when built on scaling solutions like the Lightning Network. Will this investment make Bitcoin more competitive in DeFi? Absolutely. This investment is a pivotal step towards establishing Bitcoin as a more versatile platform for decentralized finance. It can inspire further innovation, broaden the range of Bitcoin-native DeFi applications, and challenge the dominance of other blockchains in the DeFi space. Found this article insightful? Share your thoughts and help spread the word about the exciting future of Bitcoin DeFi! Follow us on social media and share this article with your network to keep the conversation going about groundbreaking innovations like KaleidoSwap and the evolving Bitcoin DEX landscape. To learn more about the latest Bitcoin DEX trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin‚Äôs institutional adoption. title: Ripple Expands Its European Reach With BBVA Custody Deal in Spain
body: Ripple has revealed a new agreement with BBVA that will see the Spanish bank adopt Ripple‚Äôs digital asset custody technology. The partnership comes as BBVA recently launched a crypto-asset trading and custody service in Spain, which offers Bitcoin (BTC) and Ether (ETH) to retail clients. Ripple‚Äôs Expansion Into Spain With this integration, BBVA will rely on Ripple Custody, an institutional-grade self-custody solution designed to securely manage tokenized assets, including cryptocurrencies. Ripple Custody allows financial institutions to scale their services and address growing client demand for exposure to digital assets while ensuring compliance with strict security, operational, and regulatory standards. The announcement further deepens the ties with BBVA, a relationship that already extends to BBVA Switzerland and Garanti BBVA in Turkey. By strengthening its custody infrastructure, BBVA said that it is positioning itself at the forefront of crypto adoption in Europe, providing retail investors. The announcement comes as banks in Europe prepare for Market in Crypto Assets (MiCA) regulations. In a statement, Cassie Craddock, Managing Director, Europe, at Ripple, said ‚ÄúNow that the EU‚Äôs Market‚Äôs in Crypto-Assets regulation (MiCA) is established across Europe, the region‚Äôs banks are emboldened to launch the digital asset offerings that their customers are asking for. BBVA has long been one of the region‚Äôs most innovative banks and we‚Äôre proud to support its ambitions with the most secure and compliant digital asset technology on the market.‚Äù Meanwhile, BBVA‚Äôs Head of Digital Assets, Francisco Maroto, said that Ripple‚Äôs custody solution will help the bank to leverage ‚Äúproven and trusted‚Äù technology and the ‚Äúhighest security and operational standards,‚Äù and enable it to directly provide an end-to-end custody service to its customers. XRP Eyes Next Move On the price side of things, Ripple‚Äôs token XRP is consolidating between $2.7 support and $3.4-$3.5 resistance, after a week of muted momentum and indecisive order flow. As the crypto asset eyes an uptick, a breakout above $3.1 could fuel upside toward resistance, while losing $2.7 risks a deeper retracement to $2.4. Until then, range-bound consolidation dominates XRP‚Äôs outlook. The post Ripple Expands Its European Reach With BBVA Custody Deal in Spain appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: Unveiling the Bitcoin Bull Market: Analyst Predicts Astounding Peak by October
body: BitcoinWorld Unveiling the Bitcoin Bull Market: Analyst Predicts Astounding Peak by October Are you ready for some exciting news in the crypto world? According to a recent analysis by renowned crypto analyst Axel Adler Jr., the Bitcoin bull market has officially entered its late stages. This isn‚Äôt just a casual observation; it‚Äôs based on meticulous data, marking 504 days since Bitcoin‚Äôs last halving event. For many, this signals a crucial period for the world‚Äôs leading cryptocurrency, prompting questions about what comes next and when we might see the ultimate high. What Defines This Late-Stage Bitcoin Bull Market? Axel Adler Jr.‚Äôs analysis highlights several key indicators that point to this advanced phase of the Bitcoin bull market . One significant event was a substantial sell-off by long-term holders that occurred in March, as Bitcoin‚Äôs price hovered around the $70,000 mark. This movement is often a natural part of a maturing market cycle, as early investors begin to realize profits. However, what makes this cycle particularly interesting is the subsequent pattern of selling. Following the initial large sell-off, Adler noted more moderate selling activity at higher price points, specifically around $98,000 and $117,000. This distributed selling, rather than a single massive dump, suggests a different kind of market dynamic at play. Why Is This Bitcoin Bull Market Showing Sustainable Strength? The pattern of distributed selling is a critical piece of the puzzle. Unlike a sudden, overwhelming wave of selling that could destabilize the market, this gradual distribution indicates a robust underlying demand. Adler suggests that this strength is highly sustainable, primarily due to strong institutional demand actively absorbing the available supply. When large institutions enter the market, they often bring significant capital, providing a solid foundation that can withstand profit-taking by individual investors. This institutional interest is a game-changer. It means that even as long-term holders take profits, there‚Äôs a continuous influx of new capital ready to buy, preventing sharp, sustained downturns. Consequently, this creates a more stable and resilient upward trajectory for the Bitcoin bull market , setting it apart from previous cycles. When Can We Expect the Astounding Bitcoin Bull Market Peak? So, what does this mean for Bitcoin‚Äôs ultimate price peak? Adler‚Äôs projection is quite specific and exciting. He points out that the final peak of a typical Bitcoin bull market cycle often occurs when the spot price reaches approximately eleven times higher than the average cost basis of long-term holders. This historical metric provides a powerful framework for forecasting the market‚Äôs climax. Based on this calculation and the current market dynamics, Adler Jr. projects that the peak of the current Bitcoin bull market will arrive between October and November of this year. This forecast gives investors a potential timeframe to consider, allowing them to plan their strategies. It‚Äôs a crucial period that could see Bitcoin reaching unprecedented highs, rewarding those who have held strong through its journey. What Should Investors Consider During This Dynamic Phase? Stay Informed: Keep a close eye on market analyses and expert opinions to understand evolving trends. Understand Selling Patterns: Recognize that profit-taking by long-term holders is a natural part of a bull market. Monitor Institutional Flow: Observe indicators of institutional investment, as their demand is a key driver of sustainability. Prepare for Volatility: While a peak is projected, crypto markets can be volatile. Be ready for price swings. Review Your Strategy: Consider your personal investment goals and risk tolerance in light of these projections. The journey of the Bitcoin bull market is always full of twists and turns, but current analysis suggests we are heading towards an extraordinary climax. With institutional demand providing a strong backbone and historical patterns pointing to a clear timeframe, the next few months promise to be exceptionally interesting for Bitcoin enthusiasts and investors alike. The stage is set for what could be a truly remarkable conclusion to this cycle. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: What does ‚Äòlate-stage bull market‚Äô mean for Bitcoin? A1: A late-stage bull market indicates that Bitcoin has experienced significant price appreciation, and while further gains are expected, it is approaching its cyclical peak, where a major correction or bear market might follow. Q2: Who is Axel Adler Jr., and what is his expertise? A2: Axel Adler Jr. is a recognized crypto analyst known for his data-driven insights into Bitcoin‚Äôs market cycles and price movements, often leveraging on-chain metrics and historical patterns. Q3: How does the Bitcoin halving event influence the bull market cycle? A3: Bitcoin halving events reduce the supply of new Bitcoin, historically acting as a catalyst for bull markets by creating scarcity and increasing demand over time, usually peaking 12-18 months after the event. Q4: Why is institutional demand crucial for the current Bitcoin bull market? A4: Institutional demand provides significant capital inflow, absorbing supply from profit-taking long-term holders. This robust buying pressure helps stabilize prices and sustains the upward momentum, preventing sharp downturns. Q5: What is the ‚Äòeleven times higher‚Äô rule mentioned by Adler? A5: This rule suggests that historically, the final peak of a Bitcoin bull market tends to occur when the spot price reaches approximately eleven times the average cost basis (the average price at which they acquired their coins) of long-term holders. Q6: What should investors consider if the peak is expected by October-November? A6: Investors should consider reviewing their investment strategies, setting profit targets, and preparing for potential increased volatility. It‚Äôs also a good time to reassess risk tolerance and diversify portfolios if needed. If you found this analysis insightful, don‚Äôt keep it to yourself! Share this article with your friends, family, and fellow crypto enthusiasts on social media. Let‚Äôs spread the word about the exciting developments in the Bitcoin bull market and spark conversations about the future of digital assets. To learn more about the latest Bitcoin trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action. This post Unveiling the Bitcoin Bull Market: Analyst Predicts Astounding Peak by October first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: Analyst States What XRP Needs to Do Next
body: XRPCro (@stedas), a crypto enthusiast and investor, recently highlighted XRP‚Äôs latest price action with a chart showing the token approaching a major resistance level. In a post on X, he drew attention to the asset‚Äôs recent climb toward $3, noting that a breakout with significant volume could help it conquer that resistance and turn it back to support. $XRP touched almost $3 again Now we need that breakout volume pic.twitter.com/o6m7HsKgKn ‚Äî XRP_Cro AI / Gaming / DePIN (@stedas) September 8, 2025 XRP‚Äôs Recent Performance Toward the end of August, XRP faced a pronounced decline. By August 30, the token had dropped below the $3 support level after large whale sell-offs during the month. The selling pressure weighed heavily on XRP‚Äôs price, and by September 1, the asset had dropped to $2.72 , with many investors worried that the decline would continue. Despite this weakness, some large holders increased their XRP positions. Momentum began to shift in the subsequent days, and by September 5, XRP had stabilized around $2.75, showing positive signs of an impending recovery. On Sunday, September 7, XRP staged a sharp rally that carried it back toward $2.92. This marked a clear recovery from the previous lows and represented one of the strongest moves since the decline. The rebound coincided with renewed demand and greater buying activity, pushing the token back toward the $3 threshold. The rally was notable because it showed buyers regaining control after consolidation . Market participants are now watching to see whether the momentum can push XRP through the $3 resistance and higher levels that have repeatedly capped its progress. We are on X, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) June 15, 2025 Chart Analysis and the Descending Triangle Returning to XRPCro‚Äôs chart, one of the key elements visible is what appears to be part of a descending triangle formation . The pattern, characterized by lower highs converging toward a flat or slightly declining support line, often signals consolidation that precedes a decisive move. In this case, the chart shows XRP at $2.98, heading toward $3, and then the upper boundary of this formation. The resistance line, marked in yellow on the chart, demonstrates where sellers have previously controlled the market. Breaking above this line with conviction would require significant volume, as XRPCro emphasized. Without that confirmation, the digital asset risks retracing back toward the established support zone around $2.7, highlighted in green on the chart.
